message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.AR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper focuses on the design of uplink radio and fronthaul transmission strategies for a C-RAN with a packet-based fronthaul network. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper introduces a multiple description coding (MDC) strategy that operates directly at the level of baseband signals to ensure an improved quality of the signal received at the cloud in conditions of low network congestion. 
3. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The paper studies the joint design of uplink radio and fronthaul transmission strategies for a C-RAN with a packet-based fronthaul network, which involves system-level considerations. 
4. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper discusses the use of multiple description coding (MDC) to improve the quality of the signal received at the cloud, which is relevant to multimedia applications. 
5. cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) - The paper does not directly focus on hardware architecture, but the use of network function virtualization (NFV) and software-defined networking (SDN) in the fronthaul transport network may be of interest to researchers in this sub-category.
